metadata.title: CVE-2020-24585 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the DTLS handshake implementation in wolfSSLbefore 4.5.0. Clear DTLS application_data messages in epoch 0 do notproduce an out-of-order error. Instead, these messages are returned to theapplication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 4.5.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0+dfsg-2').
